td.content: s:48 yr old male presents with Kidney. o:Height 163 cm, Weight 54.2 kg, Temperature 36.7 C, Pulse 87, SystolicBP 114, DiastolicBP 75, Respiration 18 a:Kidney Stones p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and prescribed Ciprofloxacin - 500 mg 2xday x 10 d, and ordered Urinalysis, Complete.
